description.value:
• Your size is Large, taking up a 10 sqft radius instead of a Medium creature's 5 sqft.
  • You have disadvantage wielding light weapons.
  • You can use weapons that lack the Heavy and Two-Handed traits for two-weapon fighting, even if they are not light. See "Off-Hand Attack" in the "Attack" section for details.
  • It does not take you a minor action to switch to or from heavy weapons.
  • Your carrying capacity is doubled, and you can attempt to use the Shove, Grapple, or Trip action against a target that is two sizes larger than you without disadvantage.
